content.html: You know about 8.8.8.8, 1.1.1.1. But did you know the UK government have their own internal resolver to be 25.25.25.25? $ host 25.25.25.25 25.25.25.25.​in-addr.​arpa domain name pointer a1.pdns.publicsectordns.gov.uk. ncsc.gov.uk/information/uk… (HT: @Basil_Fillan )
content.value:
You know about 8.8.8.8, 1.1.1.1. But did you know the UK government have their own internal resolver to be 25.25.25.25? 

$ host 25.25.25.25
25.25.25.25.​in-addr.​arpa domain name pointer a1.pdns.publicsectordns.gov.uk.

ncsc.gov.uk/information/uk… (HT: @Basil_Fillan )
